title: How to solve all dilemas, flip a coin. Stories 4 Glory (Ranked)
body:
So me and one other player had both selected fill as our roles and i ended up with support and the other player had gotten top.
Other player asked if I'd like to swap, me being indifferent to either lane said up to him and well... ohh heres the chat log :')
What an interaction.

Me: classic
P2: I filled, idc where im going but
P2: if anyone ewants to trade, let me know
Me: I FILLED ASWEEL :')
P2: do you wanna supp? Or top?
TheBasedGod : yeee im fine with either fam ~ ur call
P2: Haha I don't even mind either haha
TheBasedGod : ok
TheBasedGod : ill flip a coin
TheBasedGod : heads i supp
P3: that doesnt seem fair
P3: i will flip the coin
TheBasedGod : ooo true
Me: non-bias 3rd party
P2: okie dokie
P3: heads
P3: god gets it
P3: tails
P3: other **** gets support

(idk if you can post names, havnt check the rules)

replies.body:
Hahahahah
Maybe they should in-build a little coin fliping system for similar situations, even dice rolling, should be fun
Well it seems to me like the client did the coin flip for them, and they decided to flip a second time.
I see, I haven't got up to ranking match so no sure how it works
So was it heads or tails?
Tails, so i ended up getting top lane
